title: Republic Act No. 5527
body:
MedTech Law Overview

Regulates the practice of medical technology in the Philippines, including licensure, scope of practice, and continuing education requirements.

title: PRC Licensing Requirements
body:
Licensing for MedTechs

Requirements include graduation from a recognized MedTech program, passing the board exam, and compliance with continuing professional education (CPE).

title: Code of Ethics for MedTechs
body:
Professional Ethics

Medical technologists must maintain confidentiality, competence, honesty, and professionalism in all laboratory practices.
